metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40524 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: In Pure-FTPd before 1.0.50, an incorrect max_filesize quota mechanism in the server allows attackers to upload files of unbounded size, which may lead to denial of service or a server hang. This occurs because a certain greater-than-zero test does not anticipate an initial -1 value. (Versions 1.0.23 through 1.0.49 are affected.)

criterions.comment: pure-ftpd package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
